title: Week Two Preview; Bengals/Texans Recap
itunes:title: Week Two Preview; Bengals/Texans Recap
description:
A room filled with heroes Dan Hanzus, Marc Sessler & Gregg Rosenthal,– recap all the latest news from around the NFL including the Thursday night prime time game between the Cincinnati Bengals and the Texans. The heroes also give a detailed breakdown of what the forecast looks like for weekend two of the 2017 season.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
